title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: CIFDAQ is rapidly expanding on its quest to become the evolution of the innovative blockchain ecosystem.So, we're hiring for different roles. If you have the skillset that you believe is relevant to us, drop them a message on Twitter.https://twitter.com/cifdaq

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: It will be easier if you'll include in the post the openings and as well as the qualifications. I've seen companies do this but they rarely reply to the applications that have been sent to them because the roles are not specified. It's easy to say that anyone can contribute but it has to be specific. I'm sure that there will be interested folks to come on board with your company as long as they know that they are qualified for the post.
